InvocableActionEventLog.name: InvocableActionEventLog
InvocableActionEventLog.description: Invocable Action events capture the calls to Salesforce Invocable Actions.This is particularly useful to monitor actions invoked during Agentforce flows.

ApiCaller.description: Identifier of the API caller. This is only populated when the action is invoked from a REST API call

Duration.description: Time (in nanos) taken to process this set of requests.

FlowProcessType.description: The process type of the calling flow.

FlowVersionIdentifier.description: The ID of the version of the calling flow.

PlannerIdentifier.description: The ID of the agent planner.

RequestIdentifier.description: The unique ID of a single transaction. A transaction can contain one or more events. Each event in a given transaction has the same REQUEST_ID.

Timestamp.description: The access time of Salesforce services in GMT.

UserIdentifier.description: ID of the user employing salesforce.com services, whether through the user interface or API.
